Get Started

List of events - Organizations
When a custom field is removed
event notes
org_announcement_createdCreate new announcement
org_announcement_deletedExisting announcement has been removed
org_announcement_editedExisting announcement has been edited
org_badging_createdWhen new badge has been created for the organization
org_career_advisor_createdWhen new career advisor has been created
org_career_advisor_editedWhen career advisor is edited
org_clc_createdWhen CLC is created
org_clc_deletedWhen CLC is deleted
org_config_createdWhen new config of the organization is created
org_config_editedWhen configuration in admin console is edited-events
org_createdWhen New Organization is created
org_custom_field_addedWhen a custom field is added
org_custom_field_config_addedWhen new config is added to the custom field
org_custom_field_config_editedWhen config has been changed in the custom field
org_custom_field_editedWhen a custom field is edited
org_custom_field_removed
org_developer_api_credentials_createdGenerate API key and Secret Key
org_developer_api_credentials_deletedApi Key and secret key has been deleted
org_ecl_setting_editedECL setting has been edited
org_editedWhen a setting in org is edited
org_email_sender_createdNew Email sender is created
org_email_sender_deletedEmail sender has been deleted
org_email_sender_editedEmail sender has been edited
org_email_template_createdNew email template is created
org_email_template_deletedExisting email template has been deleted
org_email_template_editedExisting email templeate has been edited
org_embargo_addedNew Embargo site/keyword is added
org_embargo_editedEmbargo site/keyword is edited
org_embargo_removedEmbargo site/keyword is removed
org_notification_settings_editedwhen Notification setting has been edited for an organization
org_partner_center_createdWhen new patner center has been created
org_partner_center_deletedWhen partner center has been removed
org_partner_center_editedWhen partner center is edited
org_report_downloadedWhen excel/csv file is downloaded
org_role_createdWhen new Role has been created for organization
org_role_deletedWhen Existing role has been deleted
org_role_permission_disabledWhen role based permission is disbaled
org_role_permission_enabledWhen role based permission is enabled
org_sources_credential_createdGenerate Api key and secret key for Payment
org_sources_credential_deletedPayment Api and secret key has been removed
org_sources_credential_editedPayment Api and secret key has been edited
org_sso_addedSSO added the organization
org_sso_editedSSO removed from the oraganization
org_taxonomy_approvedTaxonomy approved to the platform
org_taxonomy_creatednew Taxonomy has been created
org_taxonomy_publishedTaxonomy has been published
org_taxonomy_rejectedTaxonomy rejected for the platform
org_workflow_createdA New workflow is created
org_workflow_deletedExisting Workflow has been removed
org_workflow_editedExisting workflow has been edited

Standard Fields

These fields are included with all organization events:

field notes
org_host_nameHost name of the organization
org_nameOrganization Name
org_slug
org_custom_domain
org_client_id
org_is_openIs Organization open?
org_is_registrableIs it a registrable organization?
org_status
org_send_weekly_activity
org_show_sub_brand_on_login
org_savannah_app_id
org_redirect_uri
org_social_enabled
org_xapi_enabled
org_show_onboarding
org_enable_role_based_authorization

Edited events

We record events for changes on the following attributes. Note, we split these up among org_edited and org_config_edited events, depending on how it is internally stored.

name, description, host_name, is_open, status, send_weekly_activity, xapi_enabled, enable_role_based_authorization, custom_domain, value, image_file_name, mobile_image_file_name, co_branding_logo_file_name, favicon_file_name, label, start_date, end_date, is_active, state, requestor_id, approver_id, publisher_id, source_id, shared_secret, auth_api_info, source_name


Event specific fields

Certain events have special fields included:

category events fields
Configs org_config_created, org_config_edited, org_config_deleted config_id, config_name
Announcements org_announcement_created, org_announcement_deleted announcement_name, announcement_start_date, announcement_end_date, announcement_id
Notifications org_custom_notification_sent notification_json_payload, notification_message
Taxonomies org_taxonomy_created, org_taxonomy_deleted taxonomy_id, taxonomy_label, taxonomy_requestor_id, taxonomy_approver_id, taxonomy_publisher_id, taxonomy_state
Embargos org_embargo_added, org_embargo_removed embargo_id, embargo_type, embargo_content
Source Credentials org_sources_credential_created, org_sources_credential_deleted source_credential_id, source_credential_source_id, source_credential_shared_secret, source_credential_auth_api_info, source_credential_source_name
Partner Centers org_partner_center_created, org_partner_center_deleted, org_partner_center_edited partner_center_id, partner_center_enabled, partner_center_description, partner_center_embed_link, partner_center_integration
Email Templates org_email_template_created, org_email_template_deleted, org_email_template_edited email_template_content, email_template_creator_id, email_template_state, email_template_language, email_template_title, email_template_is_active, email_template_default_id, email_template_design, email_template_id
Mailer Configs org_email_sender_created, org_email_sender_deleted, org_email_sender_edited email_sender_from_address, email_sender_from_name, is_sender_verified, mailer_config_id, is_current_sender
Developer API Credentials org_developer_api_credentials_created, org_developer_api_credentials_deleted developer_api_key
Org SSO org_sso_added, org_sso_removed, org_sso_edited org_sso_name
Roles org_role_permission_enabled, org_role_permission_disabled, org_role_created, org_role_deleted role_id, role_name, role_permission
Custom fields org_custom_field_added, org_custom_field_removed, org_custom_field_edited, org_custom_field_config_added, org_custom_field_config_removed, org_custom_field_config_edited custom_field_display_name, custom_field_id, config_id, config_name
Career Advisor org_career_advisor_created, org_career_advisor_deleted, org_career_advisor_edited career_advisor_id, career_advisor_skill, career_advisor_links
Workflows org_workflow_created, org_workflow_deleted, org_workflow_edited workflow_id, workflow_name, workflow_status, workflow_is_enabled, workflow_attributes
Badges org_badging_created, org_badging_deleted, org_badging_edited badging_id, badging_title, badging_badge_id, badging_badgeable_id, badging_type, badging_target_steps, badging_all_quizzes_answered
CLC Badges org_clc_created, org_clc_deleted, org_clc_edited clc_id, clc_entity_id, clc_entity_type, clc_from_date, clc_to_date, clc_target_score, clc_target_steps, clc_name
Other org_report_downloaded, org_ecl_setting_edited These events only have org_id and 'attributes' which is a JSON serialized dictionary
